smapsActiveEntity.msgText: 132205Z NOV 25 HYDROLANT 1920/25(GEN). 1. EFFECTIVE 31 OCT 2025, ANY DOWNLOADS OF DNC17 THROUGH ESYNC, DNC UPDATED LIBRARIES, OR DNC VDU WEBSITES PRIOR TO AND INCLUDING 10 NOV 2025 NEED TO BE RE-DOWNLOADED TO CORRECT AN ISSUE WITH H1708280. 2. THE CORRECTED VERSION OF DNC17 IS NOW AVAILABLE ON ALL NETWORKS VIA ESYNC, DNC UPDATED LIBRARIES, AND DNC VDU AS OF 1600 EST WEDNESDAY, 12 NOV 2025. 3. FOR QUESTIONS OR CONCERNS, CONTACT MARHELP@NGA.MIL. 4. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1903/25. 5. CANCEL THIS MSG 040001Z DEC 25.

302107Z OCT 25 HYDROLANT 1821/25(GEN). ADDITIONAL MILITARY LAYERS (AML) ADVISORY. 1. USERS OF NGA AML PRODUCTS ARE ADVISED OF UNINTENDED ECDIS BEHAVIOR WHEN QUERYING AREA OBJECTS WITHIN EDITION 2 OF THE BOUNDARIES AML (U4R0UMBA THROUGH U4R0UMBZ) ONLY. EDITION 1 OF THE BOUNDARIES AML, OPAREA AMLS (U4R0UOA1, U4R0UOA3, U4R0UOA0) AND HITS AML (U4R0UHIT) ARE NOT AFFECTED. NGA HAS CONFIRMED THIS ISSUE AFFECTS NAVY VMS 9.5.2; OTHER SYSTEMS ARE CURRENTLY UNASSESSED. QUERYING AREA OBJECTS OF THE BOUNDARIES AML WILL CAUSE THE ECDIS TO LOCK UP AND SHUT DOWN AFTER USER ACKNOWLEDGEMENT. NGA RECOMMENDS REMOVING BOUNDARIES AML EDITION 2 LAYERS FROM THE CHART INDEX AND USING EDITION 1. KEEPING THE EDITION 2 FILES WITHIN THE EMERGENCY NAVIGATION LAPTOP CREATES THE POTENTIAL FOR A USER TO QUERY A BOUNDARIES AML AREA OBJECT AND CRASH THE VMS UNIT WHILE UNDERWAY REQUIRING A SOFTWARE RESTART. 2. FOR QUESTIONS OR CONCERNS, CONTACT MARHELP@NGA.MIL.

171751Z JUL 25 HYDROLANT 1204/25. CANCELLED ELECTRONIC NAVIGATIONAL CHART (ENC) ADVISORY. USERS OF NGA ENC PRODUCTS ARE ADVISED OF POTENTIAL UNINTENDED ECDIS BEHAVIOR WHEN PROCESSING CANCELLED CHARTS, INCLUDING REINSTALLATION OF RECENTLY CANCELLED CHARTS ON SOME SYSTEMS WITHOUT OBVIOUS ERROR OR WARNING MESSAGES. NGA HAS CONFIRMED THIS ISSUE AFFECTS NAVY VMS 9.5 AND RAYTHEON ANSCHUTZ SYNAPSIS NX SYSTEMS. THIS ISSUE DOES NOT AFFECT NAVY ECDIS. OTHER SYSTEMS ARE CURRENTLY UNASSESSED. USERS MAY REFERENCE NGAS ENC CATALOG (GLOBAL OR REGIONAL PRODUCT LISTINGS) FOR A LIST OF CANCELLED CHARTS WHICH SHOULD BE UNINSTALLED FROM ECDIS. NGAS GLOBAL ENC CATALOG IS AVAILABLE ON HTTPS://MCDP.NGA.MIL, WITH REGIONAL ENC PRODUCT LISTING SPREADSHEETS CONTAINED WITHIN EACH REGIONS ZIP ON ESYNC, NGAS WEBSITES, AND WORLDCOVER DVD. USERS MAY FILTER PRODUCT LISTINGS FOR EDITION OF CXL AND SORT BY ISSUE DATE TO SEE MOST RECENT CANCELLATIONS. CHARTS CANCELLED WITHIN THE LAST 90 DAYS ARE ACTIVELY DISSEMINATED BY NGA AND MOST LIKELY CANDIDATES FOR INADVERTENT REINSTALLATION. NGA IS CONSULTING WITH THE USER COMMUNITY TO ASSESS POSSIBLE CHANGES TO THE CANCELLED CHART DISSEMINATION PROCESS TO MITIGATE THIS POTENTIAL UNINTENDED ECDIS BEHAVIOR.
